details.arabic_diacless: بسم اللٰه وعلى سنة رسول اللٰه
details.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ وَعَلَى سُنَّةِ رَسُوْلِ اللّٰهِ
details.translations: With the Name of Allah and according to the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 3/314 with an authentic chain. Ahmad also recorded it with the wording: With the Name of Allah, and according to the religion of the Messenger of Allah. Its chain is also authentic.

pageTitle: When placing the deceased in the grave
